definition: having a reddish-brown color, large and complicated reddish-brown glandular organ located in the upper right portion of the abdominal cavity
details:
adjective
- having a reddish-brown color
= synonyms: liver-colored
noun
- large and complicated reddish-brown glandular organ located in the upper right portion of the abdominal cavity
- liver of an animal used as meat
- someone who lives in a place
= example: someone who lives in a place
- a person who has a special life style
= example: a person who has a special life style
